title: Is it bad to be a jobless person? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think it is only bad when you are too lazy to work and expect your parents to ‘feed’ you. Everybody has their choice to do what they like but if they want to be jobless then they should at least reach certain financial status. Being jobless ensure people to pursue other important things in life like having more free time to accompany their beloved family members. However , working is stressful but can give you certain accomplishments as well. It is worth pondering on what are we really pursuing in our life.

According to me it’s not bad to be jobless person. Because if a person is jobless then he has lot of time to spend his time with his beloved ones, has opportunity to do what he actually loves, has enough time to do things for improvement of his personality and is free to enjoy the beauty of nature. And I don’t think that the jobless person is exists because doing all the things listed above is nothing but a good job.

Not bad at all but the bubble that has been constructed regarding person who has a permanent job is unwelcoming. A lot of synthetic pride has been glued to it. The society at large is to be blamed for such a thing.
No but it is bad to be a careless person
